attributes.review:

attributes.title: Yeah❤️😍

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and it did not work. At all. No features. It was blank. Except for. The voice. All you hear is Orange’s booming voice telling you to vote for him. It’s a chant. I think it’s possession or mind control. I don’t know man. Super creepy.
attributes.title: Broken app!

attributes.review: I thought this would be a place where I could find some good old Furry friends UwU but instead this is a place to support Cheeto Puffs running for office surprised OwO very sad I guess this isn’t the thing that I thought it was sad ÚwÙ 1 Star for not having Furry content OwO
attributes.title: Concerned OwO

attributes.review:
Hoping to get some reliable information, but when you get the app it just seems like a biased campaign on the news.
I’m very disappointed and was hopping for a better app.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: It gave me a virus once I downloaded this app, why was this an app anyway? I get what he wanted to do but he didn’t have to do it in an app. I love Cheeto I mean trump because he’s so “smart” and it’s confusing how to get to places on this app. I ate a chicken sandwich btw. Trump 2020❤️
attributes.title: Don’t get this😑

attributes.review: Terrible set up, everything was spelled wrong, my phone didn’t work as soon as I downloaded it, lots of technical issues, nothing loaded, the color scheme is awful
attributes.title: Not what I expected

attributes.review: omg...cant believe i even thought downloading this app was a good idea😳 i opened it and a huge piece of corn popped up on my screen😨 honestly traumatized from this experience and would not want ANYONE else going through this please don’t download this app !!
attributes.title: Corn💔

attributes.review: this app is a no from me dawg. The moment I opened up the app i saw an ugly, old, sad man who really thought he did something with this app. This app should be not allowed for anyone under the age of 21 as it can cause blindness and emotional trauma. Please be carful out there folks... bernie 2020😹✨🙈🦋💅
attributes.title: Gross ✨😌🤩

attributes.review: I have no interest in even hearing him out at this point. I wish I was old enough to vote him out of office. As a person, Donald Trump is disgusting. As a President, he is a failure. I still cannot believe he has made it this far, what a disgrace.
attributes.title: My opinion on this hot mess:

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in attempts to stay up to date with daddy trump 🥵 but when I opened it, he manifested in my room and throat punched me 😧 THEN he told me he discovered my house and FORCED my family and I out into the streets 😰 if you don’t want to be homeless PLEASE DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!
attributes.title: Take this off the App Store
